children.name: Step 3: Access Admin Pages

children.docstring: - Statistics cards (Total, Pending, Confirmed, Active Types) - Recent bookings table - Quick action links
children.name: **Dashboard** (`/wp-admin/admin.php?page=book-now`)

children.docstring: - List all bookings - Filter by status, date range - Update booking status - View customer details - Manage payments
children.name: **Bookings** (`/wp-admin/admin.php?page=book-now-bookings`)

children.docstring: - Create/Edit/Delete services - Set pricing and duration - Configure deposits - Add buffer times - Assign categories
children.name: **Consultation Types** (`/wp-admin/admin.php?page=book-now-types`)

children.docstring: - Weekly schedule management - Date-specific overrides - Break times - Holiday blocking
children.name: **Availability** (`/wp-admin/admin.php?page=book-now-availability`)

children.docstring: **General Tab:** - Business name - Account type (Single/Agency) - Timezone - Currency - Booking intervals - Advance booking limits
children.name: **Settings** (`/wp-admin/admin.php?page=book-now-settings`)

children.docstring: Use this checklist to verify everything works:
children.name: Test Checklist

children.docstring: Use these for testing:
children.name: Stripe Test Cards

children.docstring: - [ ] Switch API Mode to "Live" - [ ] Enter live Publishable Key - [ ] Enter live Secret Key - [ ] Update webhook to use live endpoint - [ ] Enter liv
children.name: Stripe

children.docstring: - [ ] Connected to production calendar - [ ] Test event created successfully - [ ] Sync direction configured correctly
children.name: Calendar

children.docstring: - [ ] All consultation types reviewed - [ ] Prices are correct - [ ] Descriptions are complete - [ ] Availability schedule is accurate
children.name: Content

children.docstring: - [ ] Terms and conditions page linked - [ ] Privacy policy page linked - [ ] Refund policy clear
children.name: Legal

children.docstring: - [ ] Complete one real test booking - [ ] Process one real test refund - [ ] Verify all emails work
children.name: Testing

children.docstring: - Verify API keys are correct (no extra spaces) - Ensure using correct mode (Test vs Live) - Check SSL certificate is valid
children.name: "Connection Failed" for Stripe

children.docstring: - Verify redirect URI matches exactly - Check OAuth consent screen is configured - Ensure Calendar API is enabled
children.name: "Connection Failed" for Google Calendar

children.docstring: - Verify redirect URI matches exactly - Check API permissions are granted - Ensure admin consent given (if required)
children.name: "Connection Failed" for Microsoft

children.docstring: - Check sync is enabled - Verify calendar is selected - Test connection works - Check error logs
children.name: Bookings Not Showing in Calendar

children.docstring: - Verify From Email is valid - Check WordPress can send emails - Try different email plugin (WP Mail SMTP) - Check spam folder
children.name: Emails Not Sending

children.docstring: - Verify timezone in Settings - Check server timezone - Ensure customer timezone detection works
children.name: Times Showing Wrong

children.docstring: Enable debug logging:
children.name: Debug Mode

children.docstring: - Check [FAQ section](HELP.md#faq) - Review [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/jcastillotx/book-now/issues) - Contact support with debug log
children.name: Getting Help

children.docstring: 1. Go to **Plugins** 2. Deactivate "Book Now by Kre8iv Tech" 3. Data remains in database for reactivation
children.name: Keep Data

children.docstring: 1. Go to **Book Now > Settings > General** 2. Enable "Delete data on uninstall" 3. Deactivate plugin 4. Delete plugin 5. All data and tables are remov
children.name: Remove Everything

children.name: Server Requirements

children.docstring: 1. Download the plugin ZIP file or clone from GitHub 2. Upload to `/wp-content/plugins/book-now/` 3. Or install via WordPress admin: Plugins → Add New

children.docstring: 1. Go to WordPress Admin → Plugins 2. Find "Book Now" in the list 3. Click "Activate"

children.docstring: **Error:** "Class 'Stripe\Stripe' not found"
children.name: Composer Dependencies Not Found

children.docstring: **Possible causes:** - Wrong API keys - Keys from different modes (test vs live) - Network/firewall blocking Stripe API
children.name: Stripe Connection Failed

children.docstring: **Google Calendar:** - Verify OAuth credentials - Check redirect URI matches exactly - Ensure Calendar API is enabled - Re-authorize connection
